g.text: ✅ Clean architecture, no backbone modifications, stable training
⚡ Enhanced medium object detection, moderate computational cost
🎪 Enhanced small and medium object detection, highest performance
• Input Projection: CNN features → RGB-like (3 channels)
• Feature Adaptation: DINO features → YOLOv12 channels
• Feature Fusion: Concatenate original + DINO features
• Spatial Consistency: Bilinear interpolation resize back
• Freezing Support: Optional backbone weight freezing
• ViT Models: vits16, vitb16, vitl16, vith16_plus, vit7b16
• ConvNeXt: tiny, small, base, large (CNN-ViT hybrid)
• Performance: +5-18% mAP improvement over base YOLOv12

svg.text: DINO-YOLO: Integrating Meta's DINOv3 Vision Transformers with YOLOv12 Object Detection
